any reason to change this? With 6 cpu it finished 1 minute earlier compared to master ( https://cirrus-ci.com/task/5018066990923776 ), so it seems like a random fluke.

Also, if someone pushes several pull requests at the same time, the scheduler will hit the total cpu limit earlier.

body:
> any reason to change this?

On master, the time required to get the task done with no caches is _very_ [close](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/25460#discussion_r906792193) to 2 hours limit.

> With 6 cpu it finished 1 minute earlier compared to master ( https://cirrus-ci.com/task/5018066990923776 ), so it seems like a random fluke.

Such comparison is not correct, because `vcpkg_binary` cache was invalidated for this PR. Functional tests are more then 10 minutes faster now.

> Also, looking at the graph, the CPU usage density is less, indicating that the 5th and 6th cpu may be idle most of the time

~Will 5 cpus be OK?~ UPDATE: Odd CPU number does not work (

+  name: "Win64 native [vs2022]"

body: too bad that this doesn't fix https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/25472. Though, I guess it can't hurt to bump now, given that we'll have to do it anyway at some point. However, I think our windows docs should match the windows CI.

> @sipsorcery
> 
> ~Could you look at linker error here? (fwiw, I have wiped all caches)~
> 
> nm, forgot to update `PlatformToolset` :)

I find myself doing that everytime I do a build. Maybe this PR is a good time to udate the default?
ACK 3dabd2891825a0b9a40276dffc5953f91a013c8d.
is `CCACHE_SIZE` set at all?

Updated 3dabd2891825a0b9a40276dffc5953f91a013c8d -> 05b2d9fe076233961ebf24e74d47c57cc0618bbb ([pr25460.01](https://github.com/hebasto/bitcoin/commits/pr25460.01) -> [pr25460.02](https://github.com/hebasto/bitcoin/commits/pr25460.02), [diff](https://github.com/hebasto/bitcoin/compare/pr25460.01..pr25460.02)):

- addressed @MarcoFalke's [comment](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/25460#issuecomment-1166445088):
> However, I think our windows docs should match the windows CI.

- addressed @sipsorcery's [comment](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/25460#issuecomment-1166455372):
>  >  nm, forgot to update PlatformToolset :)
>
> I find myself doing that everytime I do a build. Maybe this PR is a good time to udate the default?
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/0dd34773334c7f4db7b05df30ee61b011795b46d/.cirrus.yml#L6

On [master](https://api.cirrus-ci.com/v1/task/5018066990923776/logs/build.log):
```
Summary:
  Hits:             239 /  239 (100.0 %)
    Direct:         239 /  239 (100.0 %)
    Preprocessed:     0 /    0
  Misses:             0
    Direct:           0
    Preprocessed:     0
  Uncacheable:       10
Primary storage:
  Hits:             478 /  478 (100.0 %)
  Misses:             0
  Cache size (GB): 1.35 / 5.00 (27.06 %)

Use the -v/--verbose option for more details.
```

With [this PR](https://api.cirrus-ci.com/v1/task/5900879822848000/logs/build.log):
```
Summary:
  Hits:             239 /  239 (100.0 %)
    Direct:         239 /  239 (100.0 %)
    Preprocessed:     0 /    0
  Misses:             0
    Direct:           0
    Preprocessed:     0
  Uncacheable:       10
Primary storage:
  Hits:             478 /  478 (100.0 %)
  Misses:             0
  Cache size (GB): 0.07 / 0.20 (32.93 %)

Use the -v/--verbose option for more details.
```

Compare the "Cache size" string.

> Is there a reason why vs22 needs more resources?

On master, with [cleared caches](https://cirrus-ci.com/task/6104543514591232):
- time: 01:56:44
- peak memory usage: 5.08 GB

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/32963518/175824697-1d8d5078-dd7a-44b7-b793-59b1d112a876.png)

On master + 156bc89788034c509051e0635ed40694b8d717c6 commit, with [cleared caches](https://cirrus-ci.com/task/6092886604251136):
- time: 01:58:25
- peak memory usage: 5.12 GB

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/32963518/175813404-9ef3e335-ed29-4e60-925f-d02d927a153b.png)

body: reACK 05b2d9fe076233961ebf24e74d47c57cc0618bbb.

<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#25472](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/25472) (build: Increase MS Visual Studio minimum version by hebasto)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
Actually, there is no significant difference in resources at all.
